name: The Voice of Return
description:
The game tells the story of a robot that has crashed on a planet. He needs to repair himself, repair the old space base, and repair the ship so he can return home with valuable research samples.

We want to promote the values of STEM through the game and encourage especially young people to learn about mathematical sciences. We want to bring players closer to what exactly research missions to other planets look like and what astronauts have to face on a daily basis.

AlphaCrew
